news.title: Adobe Spark and Square Join Forces for a “Holiday Small Business Boost”
news.description: Adobe Spark and Square have launched a contest to win a $10,000 media buy credit and a subscription to Adobe Spark Premium, which requires signing up for a free trial of Spark.

news.title: 9 Social Media Video Ideas to Modernize Your Corporate Communications
news.description: Suggestions include FAQ videos, “top five” videos, “this or that?” videos featuring employees, behind the scenes videos of company life, product promos, and videos on trending news.

news.title: Facebook Messenger and Instagram Add Disappearing Messages Feature
news.description: “Vanish” mode on Messenger and Instagram allows users to send spontaneous messages that disappear automatically when they are seen or when the recipient leaves the chat.

news.title: TikTok Wins Yet Another Legal Reprieve, Keeping it Running in the US
news.description: The Chinese-owned social network received an extension of time to finalize its sale of US operations to Oracle and Walmart, while consequences for failing to comply remain unclear.

news.title: Twitter Rolls Out Stories, AKA ‘Fleets,’ to All Users; Will Also Test a Clubhouse Rival
news.description: The “Fleets” product allows users to post ephemeral content that will disappear in 24 hours, while Twitter also plans to test an audio-based feature that will support live conversations.

news.title: Facebook Makes Its Latest Experimental App Available to All Users
news.description: The E.gg app allows users to create web-based collages of their favorite things and share these canvases with others, including people who do not have the app, via a unique URL.
